name: Tiny Dungeon Tale *Re-up
description:
*THIS IS A REUPLOAD, AS THE PREVIOUS ONE WAS A COMPLETE MESS AND TOTALLY UNPLAYABLE. I HAVE ONLY MY SELF TO BLAME

The Northern Spring is, or was, one of the prettiest place in Esthera. The spring was suddenly infiltrated by an unknown malicious force, the power quickly overwhelmed its residents and turn the land bare. Celilia, The Wind Goddess of The Northern Spring, was taken by surprise and couldn't create a countermeasure in time.

Celilia was forced to shell herself and the spring, the final bastion of The Northern Spring. Unable to do anything further, she waited for hope to come. One day, a young cub passed by and Celilia knew, it was her only chance. Her only chance to save the spring, her home.

*All source used come from RPGMaker's source and picture from google images.
